m_szDocTitle: Shell to install German hydrogen-fueling network | Hydrocarbon Processing | October 2015
m_szDocSumamry: Shell to install German hydrogen-fueling network The hydrogen-fueling development is part of an effort to accelerate the growth in Europe of this low-carbon alternative transport fuel, according to Shell officials. Keywords: Shell will install a nationwide network of hydrogen-fueling       pumps at retail sites in Germany from 2016, the company       announced on Wednesday. The development is part of an effort to accelerate the growth       in Europe of this low- carbon alternative transport fuel,       according to Shell officials.
